data.expected_result: The long channel name should get truncated to fit in one line.
data.short_description: Long channel name doesn't get truncated when using "in:" search filter
data.steps_to_repro: - Create or have a channel with a very long name (e.g. `bug-hunter-announcements`) - Open the search - Click on the `in:` search option - Observe the very long channel name there
